properties.expression: 100 * ((data['mysql.Handler_read_rnd_next'].actual + data['mysql.Handler_read_rnd'].actual) / (data['mysql.Handler_read_rnd_next'].actual + data['mysql.Handler_read_rnd'].actual + data['mysql.Handler_read_first'].actual + data['mysql.Handler_read_next'].actual + data['mysql.Handler_read_key'].actual + data['mysql.Handler_read_prev'].actual))
properties.name: Percentage of Full Table Scans
